data.message: O my god, O my god, you are such a God, I want make a shine all about you and be like Stanley, cause I'm a peon compare to this boy who is a RAP GOD, talking about killing his wife and mom, that's so artistic, I forget a pre script dude coming with lame lines about juice and even juice, I got the stars cross the night, did you make a wish, when it snow in Africa and the Middle East, it must be climate change, but Emimen is such a God, where the ladies is showing their titties and  be domestic abuse by their Godly Eminem, what did you say TI, really, that's nice dude, Wow the 49er's made it to Superbowl and lost is that something, where all the Gamblers lost millions that day cause Vernon Davis had greasy hands, I guess money talks and taken a walk to my house, my house, now I got Rothschilds money, and bring the World War 4, to the cowardly people who are purple and yellow, man this Eminem is such a GOD, when he looks like a Dog..
